newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: RESEARCH ALERT-Hi-Cement rated a buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Hi-Cement rated a buy.

text.p: Manila brokerage Anscor Hagedorn Securities Inc recommended a strong buy for Hi-Cement Corp on Monday, saying strong demand for cement and additional supply pacts will yield hefty earnings in the near-term.

"...HCC should have no difficulty achieving exceptional results in the second quarter, sales volume is projected to more than double with margins also improving," a report by Anscor analyst Cecilio Castro said.
Hi-Cement is expected to release first quarter profits from June to August this week expected between 60 to 70 million pesos, Castro said.
By the second quarter, Hi-Cement is expected to earn 130 to 135 million pesos from a net loss of 8.4 million pesos in the same period last year due to a 40-day shutdown, Castro added.
Anscor said Hi-Cement expects steady sales from having recently won contracts to supply cement for two major real estate developments in Makati, Manila's main financial districts.
These projects are the redevelopment of the former Rockwell power plant and the Fort Bonifacio development, Castro added.
